Item.Value: Welcome to town $^$. my name is $0$. It's my job to make sure the monsters stay outside the walls. Have a good day exploring the town, but be careful if you wander outside.
Hello $^$. I hope you're well today.
You seem stressed, have you been making sure to get enough rest? A warrior is useless without sleep.
Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?
Hello, what can I do for you?.[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel]
Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.
Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.
